Music

Albums | EPs | Singles | Remixes | Guest Appearances | Mixes

ALBUMS
Demon Days

Release Date: 23rd May 2005

Formats: CD / 12″ Vinyl / 12″ Vinyl (Red Translucent) / 12″ Vinyl (Purple) / 12″ Vinyl (Picture Disc)

Where to listen: https://gorillaz.lnk.to/DemonDays

The second studio album.

Tracklist:

Intro
Last Living Souls
Kids with Guns
O Green World
Dirty Harry [feat. Bootie Brown]
Feel Good Inc. [feat. De La Soul]
El Mañana
Every Planet We Reach Is Dead
November Has Come [feat. MF DOOM]
All Alone [feat. Roots Manuva]
White Light
DARE [feat. Shaun Ryder]
Fire Coming Out of the Monkey’s Head
Don’t Get Lost In Heaven
Demon Days
D-Sides

Release date: 19th November 2007

Formats: Digital / Enhanced CD / CD / 12″ Vinyl

The second compilation album, collecting various B-sides & remixes from Phase 2.

Tracklist:

Disc 1 –
68 State
People
Hongkongaton
We Are Happy Landfill
Hong Kong
Highway (Under Construction)
Rockit
Bill Murray [feat. The Bees]
The Swagga
Murdoc Is God
Spitting out the Demons
Don’t Get Lost In Heaven (Original Demo Version)
Stop the Dams [feat. Ghostigital]
Disc 2 –
DARE (DFA Remix) [feat. Shaun Ryder]
Feel Good Inc. (Stanton Warriors Remix) [feat. De La Soul]
Kids with Guns (Jamie T’s Turns to Monsters Mix – Edit)
DARE (Soulwax Remix) [feat. Shaun Ryder]
Kids with Guns (Hot Chip Remix)
El Mañana (Metronomy Remix)
DARE (Junior Sanchez Remix) [feat. Shaun Ryder]
Dirty Harry (Schtung Chinese New Year Remix)
Kids with Guns (Quiet Village Remix)
Demon Days Live at the Manchester Opera House

Release date: 25th November 2011

Formats: Digital

The first live album, originally released on DVD in 2006; and released as an album exclusively for Spotify five years later.

Tracklist:

Intro (Live at Manchester Opera House)
Last Living Souls (Live at Manchester Opera House)
Kids with Guns (Live at Manchester Opera House)
O Green World (Live at Manchester Opera House)
Dirty Harry (Live at Manchester Opera House)
Feel Good Inc. (Live at Manchester Opera House)
El Mañana (Live at Manchester Opera House)
Every Planet We Reach Is Dead (Live at Manchester Opera House)
November Has Come (Live at Manchester Opera House)
All Alone (Live at Manchester Opera House)
White Light (Live at Manchester Opera House)
DARE (Live at Manchester Opera House)
Fire Coming out of the Monkey’s Head (Live at Manchester Opera House)
Don’t Get Lost in Heaven (Live at Manchester Opera House)
Demon Days (Live at Manchester Opera House)
Hong Kong (Live at Manchester Opera House)
Latin Simone (Live at Manchester Opera House)
EPs
Feel Good Inc EP

Release date: 24th January 2006

Formats: Digital

Tracklist:

Feel Good Inc. [feat. De La Soul]
Spitting out the Demons
Bill Murray [feat. The Bees]
DARE (Soulwax Remix) [feat. Shaun Ryder]
EP Series

Release dates: 10th October – 26th December 2006

Formats: Digital

These EPs were released exclusively on iTunes in the US; and were based on the Phase 2 singles. They included videos, B-sides & digital booklets; sadly, the videos and booklets aren’t available anymore.

SINGLES
Feel Good Inc. [feat. De La Soul]

Release date: 9th May 2005

Formats: DVD / Enhanced CD / CD / 7″ Vinyl (Picture Disc)

The first single from Demon Days.

B-sides:

68 State
Spitting out the Demons
Bill Murray [feat. The Bees]
DARE [feat. Shaun Ryder]

Release date: 29th August 2005

Formats: DVD / Enhanced CD / CD

The second single from Demon Days.

B-sides:

Samba at 13 [feat. Paraiso School of Samba]
People
Clint Eastwood (Live) [feat. De La Soul & Bootie Brown]
Highway (Under Construction)
DARE (Soulwax Remix) [feat. Shaun Ryder]
Dirty Harry [feat. Bootie Brown]

Release date: 21st November 2005

Formats: DVD / Enhanced CD / CD

The third single from Demon Days.

B-sides:

Murdoc Is God
Dirty Harry (Instrumental)
All Alone (Live) [feat. Roots Manuva]
Hongkongaton
Dirty Harry (Chopper Remix) [feat. Bootie Brown]
El Mañana / Kids with Guns

Release date: 10th April 2006

Formats: DVD / Enhanced CD / CD / 7″ Vinyl (Red Translucent)

A double A-side release; the fourth and final single from Demon Days. The DVD included work by the winners of the Search for a Star contest.

B-sides:

Don’t Get Lost In Heaven (Original Demo Version)
Stop the Dams [feat. Ghostigital]
Dirty Harry (Live at Manchester Opera House)

Release date: 21st November 2005

Formats: Digital

This release isn’t classed as a major single; it was available exclusively through the Gorillaz website.

Samba at 13 [feat. Paraiso School of Samba]

Release date: 19th December 2006

Formats: Digital

Where to listen: https://music.apple.com/us/album/samba-at-13-single/693649797

This release isn’t classed as a major single; it was available exclusively on iTunes in the US.

REMIXES
DARE (Dare Refix)

Release date: 26th August 2005

Formats: Digital

A remix by Paul van Dyk.

Dirty Harry (Schtung Chinese New Year Remix)

Release date: 27th January 2006

Where to listen: https://music.apple.com/kh/album/dirty-harry-schtung-chinese-new-year-remix-single/693615384

Formats: Digital

The DFA – The DFA Remixes: Chapter One

Release dates:

UK: 27th March 2006
US: 4th April 2006

Formats: CD / 12″ Vinyl

A remix of DARE by The DFA.

Track: 7. (CD) / A. (Vinyl) DARE (DFA Remix) [feat. Shaun Ryder]

Kids with Guns (Hot Chip Remix)

Release date: 10th April 2006

Formats: Digital

Where to listen: https://music.apple.com/gb/album/jamie-t-turn-to-monsters-kids-with-guns-remix-single/699792985

This was mistitled “Jamie T Turn to Monsters (Kids with Guns Remix)” on some platforms.

El Mañana (Metronomy Remix)

Release date: 10th April 2006

Formats: Digital

Stanton Warriors – Remixes

Release date: 13th August 2007

Formats: CD

A remix of Feel Good Inc. by Stanton Warriors.

Track: 1. Feel Good Inc. (Stanton Warriors Remix – Edit) [feat. De La Soul]

GUEST APPEARANCES
Help: A Day in the Life

Release dates:

Digital: 9th September 2005
CD: 26th September 2005
Vinyl: 25th March 2022

Formats: Digital / CD / 12″ Vinyl / 12″ Vinyl (Red) / 12″ Vinyl (Yellow)

Where to listen: https://warchild.lnk.to/Help-ADITLSo

A track made exclusively for a War Child charity compilation; the album was recorded in its entirety in under 24 hours & released online the same day. The track was later reworked for D-Sides.

Track: 16. (Digital) / 6. (CD) / B1. (Vinyl) Hong Kong (War Child)

EndSessions Volume 4

Release date: 28th March 2006

Formats: CD

Released only in the US, this was a live performance of Feel Good Inc. on a 107.7 The End compilation.

Track: 1. Feel Good Inc (Sarm Studios Session)

Martina Topley-Bird – Poison

Release date: 5th May 2008

Formats: CD

A track by Martina Topley-Bird that features Gorillaz; a B-side to her single, Poison from the album, The Blue God. Most of this track was originally recorded by Gorillaz during the Demon Days recording sessions, including the Roots Manuva vocals; which can be heard in the album’s opening track, Intro.

Track: 2. Soldier Boy [feat. Gorillaz]

MIXES
Roadkill: The Mixtape (mixed by Russel Hobbs)

Release date: 24th May 2005

Formats: CDr

This mix was given away at the Kidrobot store in San Francisco; as part of the release party held for their line of Gorillaz figures. The cover notably misspells Russel’s surname.

Demon Days (Gorillaz 20 Mix)

Release date: 23rd May 2021

Formats: Digital
